name: Sprigatito
flavorText: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokemon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Fuecoco
flavorText: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Quaxly
flavorText: This Pokemon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Mimikyu ex
Attack1Text: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokemon.

name: Quaquaval
flavorText: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokemon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Pawmot
flavorText: Pawmot's fluffy fur acts as a battery. It can store the same amount of electricity as an electric car.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Basic Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Hawlucha
flavorText: Its elegant finishing moves—performed by nimbly leaping around using its wings—are polished in the forest where it was born and raised.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and put 1 damage counter on each of them.

name: Revavroom
flavorText: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders— now numbering eight—to generate energy.
Ability1Text: You must discard an Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Spidops
flavorText: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Espathra
flavorText: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Arcanine
flavorText: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Dondozo
flavorText: This Pokemon is a glutton, but it's bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 100 more damage.

name: Miraidon
flavorText: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.
Attack2Text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Koraidon
flavorText: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Flaaffy
flavorText: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Ampharos ex
Attack2Text: You may discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon to have this attack do 100 more damage.

name: Lucario ex
Attack2Text: This attack also does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cyclizar ex
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Baxcalibur
flavorText: This Pokemon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Tinkaton
flavorText: This intelligent Pokemon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.
Ability1Text: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Murkrow
flavorText: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage for each Pokemon in your discard pile that has the United Wings attack.

name: Pelipper
flavorText: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pokemon in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may choose 1: put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand; or search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

name: Smoliv
flavorText: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Growlithe
flavorText: It's very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Tinkatink
flavorText: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokemon that eat metal.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Varoom
flavorText: It is said that this Pokemon was born when an unknown poison Pokemon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: Pikachu seems excited to be going on an adventure, and so do its new pals, from attention-seeking Sprigatito to laid-back Fuecoco and tidy Quaxly.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Miraidon ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic Lightning Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Koraidon ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to your Basic Fighting Pokemon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Chien-Pao ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, if this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: You may discard any amount of Water Energy from your Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Tinkaton ex
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage for each card in your hand.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Annihilape ex
Attack1Text: Put up to 12 damage counters on this Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter you placed in this way.

name: Meowscarada ex
Ability1Text: You must discard a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Skeledirge ex
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 less damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Quaquaval ex
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Put 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon into your hand.

name: Palafin
flavorText: This Pokemon's ancient genes have awakened. It is now so extraordinarily strong that it can easily lift a cruise ship with one fin.
Attack1Text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon didn't move from the Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does nothing.

name: Cleffa
flavorText: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

name: Togekiss
flavorText: Known as a bringer of blessings, it's been depicted on good-luck charms since ancient times.
Ability1Text: Once at the end of your turn (after your attack), you may use this Ability. Draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: Move an Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Mawile
flavorText: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Pawmi
flavorText: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Paldean Wooper
flavorText: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokemon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.
Attack1Text: Both Active Pokemon are now Poisoned.

name: Houndstone
flavorText: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokemon, this one is most loyal to its master.
Attack1Text: Put up to 2 Item cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Charmander
flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Bulbasaur
flavorText: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

name: Charmander
flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Squirtle
flavorText: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Zapdos ex
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Lightning Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.
Attack1Text: This attack also does 90 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Alakazam ex
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack can be used even if this Pokemon is on the Bench.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: This POKeMON's stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may put up to 2 Leftovers cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon also does 30 damage to itself.

name: Mewtwo
flavorText: A Pokemon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokemon.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon is damaged by an attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon equal to the damage done to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Mew ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokemon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Greninja ex
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Kangaskhan ex
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

name: Charizard ex
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic Fire Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Chi-Yu
flavorText: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.
Attack1Text: Attach up to 2 Basic Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If any of your Pokemon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Iron Bundle
flavorText: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokemon.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.) If you do, discard this Pokemon and all attached cards.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolution Pokemon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Xatu
flavorText: This odd Pokemon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun's movement all day.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Psychic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you attached Energy to a Pokemon in this way, draw 2 cards.

name: Aegislash
flavorText: Its potent spectral powers allow it to manipulate others. It once used its powers to force people and Pokemon to build a kingdom to its liking.
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon ex and Pokemon V.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Pineco
flavorText: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.

name: Sinistea
flavorText: The soul of someone who died alone possessed some leftover tea. This Pokemon appears in hotels and houses.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Cetitan
flavorText: This Pokemon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.
Attack1Text: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

name: Arctibax
flavorText: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

name: Scream Tail
flavorText: There has been only one reported sighting of this Pokemon. It resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon for each damage counter on this Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Iron Bundle
flavorText: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokemon.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.) If you do, discard this Pokemon and all attached cards.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolution Pokemon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Roaring Moon ex
Attack1Text: Knock Out your opponent's Active Pokemon. If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Knocked Out in this way, this Pokemon does 200 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: You may discard a Stadium in play. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Iron Valiant ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when this Pokemon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Greavard
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage for each Psychic Pokemon in your discard pile.

name: Maschiff
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Great Tusk ex
Ability1Text: Once at the end of your turn (after your attack), if this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, you must discard the top 5 cards of your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Iron Treads ex
Attack1Text: After doing damage, you may discard all Future Booster Energy Capsules from this Pokemon. If you do, during your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 150 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Charizard ex
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic Fire Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Mimikyu
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon ex and Pokemon V.
Attack1Text: Put 7 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Sprigatito
flavorText: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokemon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Floragato
flavorText: Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.
Attack2Text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.)

name: Meowscarada ex
Ability1Text: You must discard a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Fuecoco
flavorText: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.

name: Crocalor
flavorText: The combination of Crocalor's fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokemon's head.

name: Skeledirge ex
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 less damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Quaxly
flavorText: This Pokemon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Quaxwell
flavorText: These Pokemon constantly run through shallow waters to train their legs, then compete with each other to see which of them kicks most gracefully.

name: Quaquaval ex
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Put 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon into your hand.

name: Pikachu with Grey Felt Hat
flavorText: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches of its cheeks.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pikachu and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Mabosstiff ex
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokemon do 50 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: If your Benched Pokemon have any damage counters on them, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Sprigatito ex
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokemon's attacks do 20 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Feraligatr
flavorText: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may put 5 damage counters on this Pokemon. If you do, during this turn, attacks used by this Pokemon do 120 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't use Giant Wave.

name: Metang
flavorText: Two Beldum have become stuck together via their own magnetic forces. With two brains, the resulting Metang has doubled psychic powers.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck and attach any number of Basic Metal Energy cards you find there to your Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards and put them on the bottom of your deck.

name: Koraidon
flavorText: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Ancient Pokemon in play.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Miraidon
flavorText: This seems to be the Iron Serpent mentioned in an old book. The Iron Serpent is said to have turned the land to ash with its lightning.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards and attach them to your Future Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Carvanha
flavorText: These Pokemon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

name: Bellibolt
flavorText: When this Pokemon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: You may discard up to 2 Lightning Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 80 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Cleffa
flavorText: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Cyclizar
flavorText: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, draw a card.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Flutter Mane
flavorText: This Pokemon has characteristics similar to those of Flutter Mane, a creature mentioned in a certain book.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, your opponent's Active Pokemon has no Abilities, except for Midnight Fluttering.
Attack1Text: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Iron Thorns
flavorText: Some of its notable features match those of an object named within a certain expedition journal as Iron Thorns.
Attack1Text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. This attack does 70 damage for each Future card you find there. Then, discard those Future cards and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Shroodle
flavorText: Though usually a mellow Pokemon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Grafaiai ex
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. During your next turn, this Pokemon can't use Toxic Throw.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Oddish
flavorText: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

name: Houndoom ex
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Basic Pokemon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon also does 30 damage to itself.

name: Melmetal ex
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Metal Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Armarouge ex
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Thwackey
flavorText: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, if your Active Pokemon has the Festival Lead Ability, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Infernape
flavorText: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Fire Energy card, a Basic Fighting Energy card, or 1 of each from your hand to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Froslass
flavorText: It freezes prey by blowing its −58 degree Fahrenheit breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
Ability1Text: During Pokemon Checkup, put 1 damage counter on each Pokemon that has an Ability (both yours and your opponent's), except any Froslass.

name: Tatsugiri
flavorText: Tatsugiri is an extremely cunning Pokemon. It feigns weakness to lure in prey, then orders its partner to attack.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, if this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, you may look at the top 6 cards of your deck, reveal a Supporter card you find there, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Toxel
flavorText: It has no problem drinking dirty water. An organ inside Toxel's body filters such water into a poisonous liquid that is harmless to Toxel.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Pupitar
flavorText: This pupa flies around wildly by venting with great force the gas pressurized inside its body.
Attack2Text: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Revavroom
flavorText: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders— now numbering eight—to generate energy.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

name: Teal Mask Ogerpon
flavorText: This mischief-loving Pokemon is full of curiosity. It battles by drawing out the type-based energy contained within its masks.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Armarouge ex
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has full HP, it takes 80 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Palafin ex
Ability1Text: Put this Pokemon into play only with the effect of Palafin's Zero to Hero Ability.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Walking Wake ex
Ability1Text: Damage from attacks used by this Pokemon isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Iron Leaves ex
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch it with your Active Pokemon. If you do, you may move any amount of Energy from your other Pokemon to this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Pecharunt
flavorText: Its peach-shaped shell serves as storage for a potent poison. It makes poisonous mochi and serves them to people and Pokemon.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, put 5 more damage counters on your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon during Pokemon Checkup.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokemon can't retreat.

name: Kingambit
flavorText: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has 4 or more damage counters on it, that Pokemon is Knocked Out.

name: Kingdra ex
Attack1Text: Put up to 3 Water Pokemon from your discard pile onto your Bench.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Greninja ex
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Ledian
flavorText: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has 90 HP or less remaining to the Active Spot.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Crabominable
flavorText: Though its punches are powerful, this Pokemon's movements are sluggish. It blows icy bubbles from its mouth to immobilize its opponents.
Ability1Text: Attacks used by this Pokemon cost Colorless less for each Kofu card in your discard pile.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't use Haymaker.

name: Drifblim
flavorText: They carry people and Pokemon, but the wind can catch them, so there can't be a fixed destination.
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your Drifloon and Drifblim in play. This attack also does 30 damage to each of your Drifloon and Drifblim. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Bouffalant
flavorText: These Pokemon can crush a car with no more than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on their heads hold higher positions within the herd.
Ability1Text: As long as you have at least 1 other Bouffalant in play, all of your Basic Colorless Pokemon take 60 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). The effect of Curly Wall doesn't stack.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Horsea
flavorText: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.

name: Porygon2
flavorText: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokemon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Latias
flavorText: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Psychic Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Tinkaton
flavorText: This intelligent Pokemon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.
Attack1Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon also does 60 damage to itself.

name: Noctowl
flavorText: Its extremely soft wings make no sound in flight. It silently sneaks up on prey without being detected.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, if you have any Tera Pokemon in play, you may search your deck for up to 2 Trainer cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Victini ex
Attack1Text: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't attack.

name: Miraidon ex
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Attach a Basic Lightning Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Gouging Fire ex
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Blaze Blitz again until it leaves the Active Spot.

name: Raging Bolt ex
Attack1Text: Discard your hand and draw 6 cards.
Attack2Text: You may discard any amount of Basic Energy from your Pokemon. This attack does 70 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Iron Crown ex
Ability1Text: Attacks used by your Future Pokemon, except any Iron Crown ex, do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on those Pokemon.

name: Iron Boulder ex
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon is damaged by an attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Pecharunt
flavorText: Its peach-shaped shell serves as storage for a potent poison. It makes poisonous mochi and serves them to people and Pokemon.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, put 5 more damage counters on your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon during Pokemon Checkup.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokemon can't retreat.

name: Gouging Fire
Attack2Text: If your opponent has 4 or fewer Prize cards remaining, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Chien-Pao
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard a Stadium in play.
Attack1Text: Put an Energy attached to this Pokemon into your hand.

name: Magneton
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 3 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Lightning Pokemon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, this Pokemon is Knocked Out.

name: Indeedee
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may heal 30 damage from your Active Pokemon and have it recover from a Special Condition.

name: Wooper
Attack1Text: Shuffle up to 3 Basic Water Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Quagsire
Attack2Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. This attack does 80 damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.

name: Zapdos
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Pachirisu
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. Attach a number of Basic Lightning Energy cards up to the number of heads from your discard pile to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Magneton
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 3 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Lightning Pokemon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, this Pokemon is Knocked Out.

name: Squawkabilly ex
Ability1Text: Once during your first turn, you may discard your hand and draw 6 cards. You can't use more than 1 Squawk and Seize Ability during your turn.
Attack1Text: Attach up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Charizard ex
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 100 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Houndstone ex
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Cinderace ex
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon can't use Flare Strike.
Attack2Text: This attack does 180 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lapras ex
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Look at the top 20 cards of your deck and attach any number of Energy cards you find there to your Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Terapagos ex
Attack1Text: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from Basic non-Colorless Pokemon.
